reviews.review: It's a lot better then 1st, witch was already good.  lot of things have added, now there is also a coop for a lot of players have waited.
Very good

Игра - великолепная возможность любителям решать задачки на смекалку опробовать свои силы. Над некоторыми уровнями приходилось довольно долго мозговать. Помимо всего, радует графика и движок. Небольшие минусы (сугубо на мой взгляд): некоторая, все-таки, однообразность уровней; давящая темная атмосфера..
great game

Портал 2 не нуждается в рекомендациях – блестящий дизайн, блестящий стиль, блестящий юмор, блестящие персонажи, классика как она есть. Единственное, чего ей не хватает – встречи с Гордоном Фриманом в третьей части сами знаете какой игры)))

Your a chick with a gun that shoots a blue and orange hole, what can go wrong? -pew pew....falls to death- *retry*
Portal 2 is also hella fun and again, the same person that doesnt like puzzle games managed to like this, but not only do i like just portal 2 storyline, i like that it has coop, new features, and a hilarious set of characters.
One of the best puzzle games ever made.

Storywise? Bad, even I dare to say it's worse than mainstream games. In par for mediocre indie platform games. Actually, there's story packed in 1 chapter, the fall. The rest? No.

But, there's a huuuge good point in this game that make up those negativity. Characteristic! Who don't love GLaDOS' sarcasm? Her personality? Or Wheatley's talkative?

More! Gameplay, this is absolutely brilliant. 

I don't usually play puzzle games, less story, and honestly I HATE silent protagonist. And yeah, I hate chell because I don't know anything what she is except from GLaDOS' description (yeah... description). But, you'll be love GLaDOS.

I really can't fault this game at all. I try, but I just can't think of anything! Terrific fun and a refreshing change from the normal run of violent games ( In some small way, it’s a shame that Valve didn’t manage to avoid a violent finale ). It’s just fantastic. Buy it. You won’t be disappointed.

E' Portal, Uno dei giochi più belli cui abbia mai giocato. Un level design sbalorditivo, storia con colpi di scena e condita da un black humor spassoso per come viene proposto. Trama fantastica e finale incredibile. Modalità cooperativa origianle e ben studiata. C'è anche la modalità splitscreen. COsa volete di più?

Continuing on from the awesomeness that was the original Portal, Portal 2 manages to transport you through so many beautiful and interactive environments. Whether you hate turrets or you want to continue the story Portal 2 is for you! Personally it is my favourite game paired with Portal, don't ask me to choose between them, and I would love for anyone and everyone to get involved with it!

Now with the added appeal of the Perpetual Testing Initiative, or Test chamber creator, for making you own test chambers to puzzle your friends or confuse Portal 2 players worldwide there's no excuse not to get Portal 2! (Seriously, there isn't)
예술의 경지

"The Schrödinger's Cat paradox outlines a situation in which a cat must be considered, for all intents and purposes, simultaneously alive and dead. Schrödinger created this paradox as a justification for killing cats."
Portal 2-Very entertaining. A puzzling game that recquires the mind. Very Fun.
Hard & fun game! =)

Для меня это как оказалась одна из самых лучших игр запавших мне в душу. Шикарный сюжет,ну отпускающий вас ни на секундку,потрясающая атмосфера! Я тратил уйму времени разглядывая все локации. Даже после прохождения основного сюжета в соло,вам еще дается поиграть в коопе что очень тоже интересно и местами ппц как сложно)

В общем этой игре я однозначно даю 10 из 10!

95 балів на метакритику. Ця оцінка цілком заслужена. Просто шикарна компанія. Хороший гумор, цікаві головоломки та краплина таємничості. Приємний графічний стиль, чудовий саундтрек. Лише цього достатньо для схвальної рецензії, проте тут ще є кооперативний режим та мапи майстерні. Portal 2 це саме той випадок коли продовження не підвело, ба навіть стало кращим за першу частину. 
Хоча є і зворотня сторона медалі 3 частина навряд чи зможе перевершити те що вже є, саме тому ми її ніколи не побачимо, для розробників це просто не вигідно.
Особиста оцінка 10/10.
Juste le meilleur jeu du monde o/
I thought the first game was good.....until I played this one.
Excellent FPS puzzle game that does nothing but improve on the first one.
I recommend this.
The game that will survive the test of time.
lit
Ce jeux est juste super tout comme le 1 achetez le sa vaux le coup !

First of all, the single player. Second of all, the Coop. Single player in this game is pretty cool. It's better if you have played the first Portal, but they will tell what happened in previous game. You play as Chell, a woman trapped in Aperture Science building underground. You try to escape from evil "testing robot" GLaDOS. Play the story mode. Then play coop. Coop bases on two "test robots", who do test chambers together. Play with your friend! Highly recommended. Really fun and you get to laugh more than ever. Achievements are fun to get (most of them are coop-based). This game is awesome! I would give this game 9/10.
"This game is great! Nuff said." -Bigshow
Отличная игра! Единственная в своем роде. Сюжет захватывает, возможность прохождения вдвоем несомненно радует
A must own for anyone who has a steam account.
Jeu culte, à faire absolument !
its a great game amazing story super fun plus co-op and level editer for workshop!
До сих пор восхищаюсь :) Игрушка прелесть ;)
A very good game. I highly recommend its purchase. 9/10
Best game. Ever!

Probably one of my top games of all times. I really can't think of anything bad to say, everything about it is amazingly well engineered to be gripping, satisfying, challenging with the best presentation possible. Will probably leave a mark on your life in the form of amazing things to remember.
GENIALE

My 2nd favorite game on Steam (next to Terraria, see other recommendations) and my 2nd favorite 3D World game (next to Minecraft). The puzzles are hard, and I'm confused sometimes on what to do, but I figure it out slowly and my play time grows. Even if you beat the main game, there's like thousands of other test chambers made by people on the Steam Workshop, allowing for countless hours of playtime whether it's before or after the game's completion. 4.5/5 stars.

Portal 2 is already a classic in the puzzle Genre. Valve couldn't have made it any better since any improvement attempt would probably break it.

GladOS demands you to test Portal 2!

Einfach geiles Spiel, auch wenn man die Story von Portal 1 nicht kennt, hat man keine Probleme um dieses wunderschöne Spiel zu spielen! Um alle Handlungen der Charaktere zu verstehen, muss man Portal 1 jedoch einmal gespielt haben. Also Story, Gameplay und Design einfach prima!

Un videogame assolutamente epico, sotto ogni punto di vista! Valve riesce a stupire, come sempre, creando un seguito degno del precedente capitolo, pieno di umorismo e di una serie infinita di rompicapi incredibilmente divertenti, ma anche complessi!
Fra l'altro, c'è un ribaltamento, un gioco delle parti inaspettato, che costringe la povera, senza genitori e muta Chell, a collaborare con l'intelligenza artificiale più spaventosa della storia, Glados, per sconfiggere l'unico cancro che avrebbe potuto distruggere le enormi capacità di quest'ultima, ovvero Wheatley, l'Idiota! 
I nuovi strumenti a disposizione del videogiocatore, come i vari tipi di gel, o i tunnel che permettono di fluttuare in aria, aumentano l'intrattenimento di Portal 2 in modo incredibile, così come la straordinaria modalità cooperativa, dove ritroviamo Glados sufficientemente in forma da insultarci ogni volta che desidera, per il nostro più totale divertimento!
Insomma, un gioiellino a cui tutti dovrebbero giocare, almeno una volta nella vita! :)
Worth playing. The puzzles are fun and challenging to do. Some minor extra stuff what Portal 1 didnt have

Maravilloso juego que te tiene pegado a el hasta que seas capaz de resolver todos sus puzzles. Si estás cansado de jugar siempre a lo mismo y queréis un reto, Portal (tanto ésta como su primera entrega) es vuestro juego. 
Desafiante a más no poder y que además goza con una comudidad enorme para que podáis seguir disfrutando con más niveles.
Pocos son los juegos que consiguen engancharme, pero Portal es uno de ellos y en mi opinión uno de los mejores que hay.

En definitiva, ¡tenéis que jugarlo! )
Для мозгов - самое то! А если и мультиплеер - ШИК!

As with the original Portal, the sequal is one of my all time Top Ten.

This game is one of my top 3 best games ever! First portal game was good, but this was better. Story was funny, exciting and even sad. I enjoyed every minute I spent while playing this game. Puzzles weren't too hard because I didn't need any walkthrough help to solve those. Just an amazing game.. *snif*

[h1]Portal 2 - эта одна из тех самых игр, которая запомнится навсегда.[/h1]
Долгое время Лаборатория исследования природы порталов пребывала в запустении и о GLaDOS ничего не было слышно. Очнувшуюся из состояния анабиоза Челл встречает один из многочисленных модулей персональности по имени Уитли, который соглашается проводить её к спасательной капсуле. В результате они попадают в комнату управления, где, пытаясь подать питание на спасательную капсулу, Уитли случайно включает GLaDOS.GLaDOS, однако, не спешит мстить Челл; вместо этого она возобновляет испытания с портальной пушкой и одновременно с этим принимается за восстановление разрушенной Лаборатории.
[h1]1 сарай из 5[/h1]

はっきり言って、本当に普通に面白い。

best puzzle game ever

Amazing game. Much longer than Portal 1 is, but isn't drawn out. Has good plot twists and turns, good character development, interesting characters and funny dialogue. Co-Op is fun and challenging, but doesn't have very good replayability. In the story, it's very interesting getting to descend into the depths of Aperture and see how it was around 30-60 years ago. 

Overall this is a great game, you won't regret buying it especially if you enjoyed Portal 1.

amazingly fun to play either by yourself or with a friend. I loved the graphics and general gameplay style as it was both trivial and precise. playing with a friend is definitely more fun and the separate co-op campaign offers tons of hours of enjoyment, whether it is from killing your friend 'accidently' or from glados' humorous inserts. I highly recommend this game because the controls are simple for keyboard and gamepad/xbox360 controller and the game is responsive. The game also involves several elements/mechanics that you can enjoy such as utilizing momentum, guiding your partner through mazes (if co-op), creative thinking, and much much more. For a scale rating i would give this game a 10/10; my only complaint would be that the game ends.
